text:
Hello, I am looking for a HubSpot developer that can help to design a webpage template that will allow me to copy and paste data tables from excel into the page and the data will show in the mobile version of the page without resizing the table and causing overlapping text. It was suggested to me that I would use media queries to make these adjustments but this is beyond my abilities. Screenshots attached.

Please share a cost and timeframe for completion if you are able to help. Thank you very much in advance.

Hey <@U063JNNK0TH> I canâ€™t help with the development for now, but here is a good article comparing some approaches to displaying tables on mobile devices.

It might help you and the developer align the expectations :smile:

<https://medium.com/appnroll-publication/5-practical-solutions-to-make-responsive-data-tables-ff031c48b122>
Tables are normally not a very good idea to implement for mobile... too skinny
You can use some js libraries like "Data Table" and others. Or you can set min-width to the table with horizontal overflow scroll.
